They explained what they were doing at each stage and also demonstrated the cooker's functions and caveats regarding use.Our one objection was that John Lewis told us that the cooker would be delivered in time for our family Xmas.  It finally arrived on January 12th.  Black mark, I'm afraid!

Excellent build quality.Very east to install.Only problem is trying to read the symbols on the oven switch! They are so small and are hard to see due to reflections in the chrome finish. Would be nice if the selection ring was black and the symbols white rather than all chrome.

Needed a user guide for an appliance that we inherited with the house when moving. Sent a photo, and Dhillon responded with first a link (which didn't work!) then a pdf which was just what we wanted. Now we know what the previous owners took away with them!!!Thanks Dhillon.

So far I love the induction hob -it is as good as my old gas hob with the benefit simmer is a lot cooler, so I can simmer without burning and as a ceramic top it's easy to keep clean.  Perhaps there are too many option on the main oven - basically I leave it on fan.  There is not enough information on how much power the cooker needs on anything other than maximum but so far it runs fine on 32A.

Bought from Dwyers in Cork. No issues with delivery etc- but unit was expensive.Didn’t realise that unit would require power supply by way of 10 square cable in place of existing 6 square - more work and expense. This matter was not entirely clear on spec. Nevertheless happy with unit.

Review.Titre: Happy with Cooker hood however Instructions could be clearer
Review.Contenu: Happy with Cooker Hood and Delivery of item. Well packaged. Only complaint we have is that for once my hubbys started fitting by actually ready instructions. However was not very clear regarding the full hood and the fact it wasn’t actually needed for the recirculating part. Ended up having to drill hole in the wall that wasn’t wanted.

The warranty registration was simple. the auto acknowledgment could have contained a reference number and timescale.  I subsequently used the online chat function and was very pleased with the service I received. Hopefully the repair will be timely and effective

It’s early days and the rangemaster is meeting my expectations. I cooked Christmas dinner on it and the two large ovens worked a  treat. I will rarely use the second oven, as there’s only 2 of us, but it’s handy having a large second oven. The oven doors could be better as you have to make sure it is closed. With my previous range I just pushed the door and it caught without a problem.  You do get what you paid for and  the Toledo is a bit tinny compared to my previous range which was a dual range. But the time spent in not having to slave over my cooker when cleaning it is fabulous.

Review.Titre: We have ordered the same cooker and…
Review.Contenu: We have ordered the same cooker and model as our last cooker as we have been more than pleased with its performance .  Would have been 5stars but for one thing… same cooker, classic 90…but it wouldn't fit into the space…we had to pay a workman £120 to take approx 2mm off the granite worktop to get it in.  So it wasn’t the same size as it said.Ps… the last rangemaster gave us 17years of brilliant use!

Review.Titre: I am impressed with the gas cooker
Review.Contenu: I am impressed with the gas cooker. Perfect performance in every aspect. The oven takes getting used to. I now reduce baking/roasting times and bake on a slightly reduced temperature. The oven gets very hot. And I have to get used to the fact that you have to practically go down on your knees to open or close the oven and check on your baked goods inside the oven during baking. Other than that: an eye catcher in the kitchen and a high performer.

Review.Titre: Customer service was good when confusion with delivery dates occured…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was good when a problem with delivery dates for our Rangemaster cooker occurred. I was able to speak to an advisor straight away. Sophie was very helpful and put me through to the delivery company who confirmed a date. She then emailed to double check delivery details as she’d spotted an error in our order number. So grateful Sophie contacted us and sorted out the problem.

This is a replacement for my original range master Elan. Not at the same standard as previously. Less substantial and difficult to clean smears from the hob surface and polish it. Less quality overall than previous model. 9/12/2023 Disappointed.

The delivery and installation emails and texts got really confusing. I had 5 emails in total telling me that delivery was confirmed for 8th June. What I didn't realise there was a further text from the delivery/installation people and until you have confirmed it with them your your delivery is NOT confirmed. Needless to say my cooker never arrived.Sophie from Rangemaster has been a star and has sorted out a new delivery date for the 13th. She went over and above to sort this out for me and overall I am very pleased with the service.

Review.Titre: LPG Conversion-So far not so good
Review.Contenu: So far not so good. Emailed to ask about getting an LPG conversion kit for the range cooker I had just ordered. I got an immediate response (great) saying that a kit was being posted out and would be here in 2-4 working days (double great!). Still waiting 5 working days later and can't get a response from them by email to help me find out where the kit is (not great😏). In the meantime we are having to cook between the oven and a camping stove, which is really challenging. Disappointed that their communication isn't better.Update: following the response below they checked with parts and, as the items had still not been despatched, they got them to send them out within a few days. Now we are cooking with electric and gas!! And the range cooker is amazing-so much more effective and efficient than our last brand

Review.Titre: Igniter unit on our new Rangemaster was…
Review.Contenu: Igniter unit on our new Rangemaster was not working. Following a call to Rangemaster an engineer was promptly dispatched, and solved the problem.Disappointed it happened in the first place, but pleased with the quick response to rectify
Good so far. Not as robust as earlier similar models with thinner wires on oven and grill trays. Looks good and like for like ish replacement for old model beyond economic repair.

This is the third single oven RangeMaster we have had, and it's so much better than the previous two.  It seems the company has at last sorted the problems of the oven out. Even simmering on the hob is better. Don't buy an old one

Review.Titre: I love my rangemaster gas cooker, however...
Review.Contenu: I have waited a long time to get my rangemaster gas cooker and love it. However, after buying a quality cooker I did not expect to have to fit my own door handles and align oven doors. It wouldn't have been quite so bad if there had been an instruction leaflet to help hence the  drop in a star

Cooker is great - my third 110 so know what to expect. Love having both main ovens now as fan ovens. Also like the improvements to the platewarmer so can use as a sixth ring. Drops a mark for the major issue of having a distorted side panel which means one of the oven doors doesn't shut smoothly. Surprised that the drawer is still on a plastic mechanism when this has been a weak point known for many years. This model is the Kitchener - a small point but the font is very basic and jars with the much more decorative script of the Rangemaster logo.

Purchased an induction Rangemaster infusion 90 as a kitchen refit. Absolutely delighted with the look and most importantly how it cooks. Everything cooked on time and exactly as it should with immediate fluctuation in temperature on the hob. Customer service excellent as the only issue I’ve had is a faulty painted grill door which has been ordered for replacement. Other than this delighted.

Review.Titre: Lovely looking cooker I wish the oven…
Review.Contenu: Lovely looking cooker I wish the oven doors opened down instead of sideways or there was an option. Also could igniter for gas be on buttons instead of separate button. However simple to use otherwise and efficient cooking

Review.Titre: I bought a cooker which died within 6…
Review.Contenu: I bought a cooker which died within 6 weeks of use due to electrical/circuit errors. An engineer was called to fix it but it was written off. This is when the ordeal began. Aga Rangemaster agreed to replace the cooker but shipment and delivery were repeatedly rescheduled/delayed due to manufacturing the shipping problems. We were without a cooker for nearly 3 months. I would have given this review 1 star had it not been for Sophie in customer services who kept me informed of what was happening throughout. Eventually Sophie arranged for a temporary solution to family life without a cooker. The replacement cooker finally arrived and appears to be working fine for now. I am now a cautious customer of aga rangemaster.

The Professional + 100 induction cooker looks great and the hob is very responsive, quick to aheat up and easy to clean. We like have controls by old-style knobs rather than on the hob itself. The ovens are a good size compared to many alternatives. The only downside is that the ovens do not reach the temperatures sown on the dials. They have improved a little with use, but are still typically 10 - 15 degrees less hot in reality compared with the dial. Rangemaster said this was normal, but we would expect a new range cooker to be accurate rather than having to adapt to its discrepancies. It’s certainly important to have an oven thermometer to understand the real temperatures. Also, the grill section cannot easily be used as a plate warmer, as suggested, because the grill pan takes up too much space and is not easy to take out. Generally, we are happy with our purchase.

My overall experience with rangemaster was not great. Poor communication skills and I was forwarded to a lady for spares who was useless. They were getting a 1 star review but then I found Charlie and she was fantastic. She answered all of my questions, followed up with an email with further info and turned this review form a 1 to a 4. If I had Charlie from the start this review would have easily been a 5 star review.

Review.Titre: The response was quick and answered all…
Review.Contenu: The response was quick and answered all my questions about the old Rangemaster functions.I do wish, however, that Rangemaster as a trusted brand would consider going a step further:This is an issue which I am sure must happen with the very high quality of the Rangemaster product: It is an 18 year old Rangemaster and although used daily for wonderful family meals is in supremely good condition and working well.  However, the owner, my mother-in-law, has aged and is not working well.  She is getting forgetful and although the glass lid closure turns off a gas burner left on - her sinus problems mean that she is not smelling the gas when the next day’s opening of the lid means unlit gas continues to come out into the kitchen - and of course her failing hearing means that she does not even hear it hissing out.This is arguably just as (or could be even more) hazardous as one of the gas burners left on at the time she has been using it - as she could then see it when cleaning up the kitchen.  The following day however, she has forgotten she ever used the burner.I had hoped that something could be fitted to fix this - but was told not.  I really do think that Rangemaster could and should be able to provide advice to fix this even if they themselves can not.

I chose the Rangemaster Toledo+110 induction in black to replace my previous range oven. I really like it - it's well made & of solid construction (the delivery men moaned about how heavy it was), looks good and heats up so fast (and hot) compared to my old one, both the induction rings and the ovens. So why not 5 stars? Two things: first- probably my fault for not reading the spec properly - but it has two fan ovens whereas my old one had one fan and one multi function oven. I didn't realise this didn't have the multi function option as I prefer non fan for baking but there you go I'll just have to deal with it. Second, the grill is small for such a large oven, although I do like the slide out bars it sits on so no more having to hold the grill pan with one hand whilst turning food over with the other. Overall I am really pleased I chose this model.

Update review. I recently posted a negative review relating to the delayed delivery of my new cooker and damage to the cookerhood, plus other  niggles.Since then the Rangemaster team have responded in a timely and courteous manner and have  been very nice to deal with. I have also been compensated for the inconvenience caused. My kitchen is now complete and I am enjoying cooking on my Rangemaster Delux.

Review.Titre: It's a lovely mini range and up to now…
Review.Contenu: It's a lovely mini range and up to now I find using it very good in all aspects. The only thing is I had range cookers in the past and the sides always match the front so appear totally free standing but the mini range doesn't and I must have missed that in the advertising.

Review.Titre: Matt Boyle on the online chat was very…
Review.Contenu: Matt Boyle on the online chat was very efficient and was able to resolve my problem quickly and politely. It would have been 5 stars, but I had tried ringing first and was kept on hold. Live chat was much quicker

Professional 60+ all gas freestanding cooker. The product fulfilled expectations. Rare now to find a cooker with two gas ovens. Only criticism is fan noise that persists for some time even after the oven is off.

Review.Titre: It’s a very expensive cooker so it…
Review.Contenu: It’s a very expensive cooker so it should be in the top 95-100% for reliability.A fault I feel that could be a concern for someone with a visual disability is the numbers and markers on the controls should be highlighted (for example) in the colour red as against chrome the small black figures and marker points don’t really stand out clear enough.

Sophie, the home delivery coordinator was extremely helpful and sorted out issues that I had with John Lewis customer service team. She kept me updated throughout the process for which I am very grateful.

Nice cooker. Instruction leaflet is a bit rudimentary, not adequately explaining the clock setting or giving examples of when the higher heat settings might be useful. Both issues very easily rectified.

Review.Titre: I had a problem with a brass tap
Review.Contenu: I had a problem with a brass tap, and chatted with the customer service team. Matt was very knowledgeable and pinpointed the issue. A new lever will be sent, and hopefully the problem will be sorted.
Our range was delivered with a missing part. Whilst this was frustrating, Sophie organised a replacement quickly and efficiently.

The ordering process and the delivery of our Rangemaster cooker were extremely good. However, after sales has been a little disappointing, not least in getting through to the correct department. Still awaiting delivery of missing parts, with no apology offered.

Review.Titre: Chatting to a real person was a great…
Review.Contenu: Chatting to a real person was a great help - I hate chatting to bots. Charley was patient and dealt with the issue as far as he could. I now await contact from the service provider.

We purchased a new black 110 Esprit Rangemaster this Summer and installed it in the Autumn following the completion of our renovation. It's a super model, we found the product details, delivery and service great. The cooker grill and ovens are super efficient. Happy with our choice.We discovered once it was installed, one of the lights didn't work on the oven dials. Covered under warranty, someone came to inspect it within 48hrs of reporting it. We are now waiting for the item to come into stock so it can be replaced - to note the oven itself does work, just not the light.The gas hob rings get marked super easily and we've been advised it isn't particularly easy to get the burn marks off (without using a scourer or similar which will mark them), which is pretty disappointing in light of the cost the cooker.

The problem was dealt with in good time, given it required 2 organisations to be involved and occurred initially just before Christmas.Shannon dealt with both the issue and myself in  the refund process professional and clearly way . Providing confidence and certainty.

Review.Titre: Quick response and very helpful by…
Review.Contenu: Quick response and very helpful by Charley.Hoping the plinth issue will be resolved for my Falcon Range (which is amazing!).

Review.Titre: Got some helpful information via live…
Review.Contenu: Got some helpful information via live chat re a cooker hood prior to purchasing.Very prompt in answering.

After waiting more than in excess of 7 months and delivery dates postponed the new Nexus SE110 arrived 02/02/22 unfortunately all was not as it should have been after phone calls & photos being sent to Agarangemaster after speaking to James., to cut a long story short the "New Nexus" had to be exchanged and fortunately another New Nexus SE110 was found new delivery date given was 14/04/22 by Mathew. After another phone call from Mathew at Agarangemaster another delivery date was given as 14/03/22.Karboodle actually delivered and installed the Nexus SE110 -  07/03/22.,which was a welcomed great surprise. Our many thanks to the guys from Karboodle who were very efficient, polite, and professional. You did a great job "Thank you" We would also like to extend our thanks to Mathew Boyle who did an absolutely sterling job to rectify the situation efficiently, politely, and professionally. Unfortunately having Covid 19 the review has been delayed for  recover.

Purchased a Rangemaster 110 induction in March 2022. Duly registered with Rangemaster and received our warranty from their appointed rep Homeserve for a 2 year '24/7 365 day' call number. Today our Rangemaster suddenly went "bang" and tripped the circuit breaker whilst using one oven and 1 ring of the induction hob to cook Mothering Sunday meal. Rang the number on the Homeserve warranty, got directed to a premium rate number, used 'just say no' to get normal call rate. Rep said no one could help as all offices closed until 9am Monday but gave a number to 'try'. Recorded message from rangemaster/aga to try again in normal office hours. Totally useless and false representation. Shame on Rangemaster and Homeserve.UPDATE - after a very poor start, Rangemaster pulled out all the stops to remedy the problem. They sent a local Rangemaster approved electrician who quickly diagnosed that the installation by AO was incorrect. The wires were crossed over and over time had burned through the wire casing which had tripped the consumer unit. He was able to repair the wiring so that we could safely use the appliance and ordered a new electrical board from Rangemaster. Unfortunately the first board was an incorrect part but the right one did arrive a week later and was fitted by the electrician. although the fault was by the AO installation, Rangemaster paid the bill and ensured that we did not have to chase AO for recompense. Thank you Rangemaster and Grange Electrical, Birkenhead

Review.Titre: problem with product not customer service
Review.Contenu: brogan was able to quickly allocated an engineer to the issue i have,  i hope the engineer will be able to solve the problem. good customer service, problem is with the product, not customer service

Eugenie from Customer Care picked up this issue and resolved the mix-up.  I have now received the replacement sink thanks to Eugenie's intervention and feel that I should update my review to reflect the good customer service I have received.I purchased a Rangemaster Double Belfast ceramic sink from Tap Warehouse in November 2021.  I was attracted to this product owing to the Aga Rangemaster brand which I viewed as premium and because the sink came with a 10 year warranty.  The sink developed some pock marks after a year or so, so I contacted Rangemaster and sent some photographs.  Rangemaster acknowledged that the sink was faulty and offered to replace it.  When I said that I had installed the sink in my French holiday home they refused to honour the warranty as I had "exported" the sink.  Nowhere on the Tap Warehouse website nor Rangemaster's was it stipulated that the warranty would not be valid if the sink were "exported".  I have asked several times where this information can be found and have yet to be told.  Frankly, I am disgusted with this service and would suggest that it may be indicative of potential difficulties with other warranty claims.
The delivery took quite a while as I had chosen an unusual colour. Once the range cooker had been delivered to the warehouse, final delivery was quick and efficient

Review.Titre: Very pleased with my new range cooker
Review.Contenu: Very pleased with my new range cooker, (professional plus) although it was second choice as when original (professional deluxe) came it was faulty, and could not get the same model in a timely manner. I do agree with other reviews that the symbols on the dials are very hard to see.apart from that I am very happy.

Review.Titre: Giving 4 stars as the service in…
Review.Contenu: Giving 4 stars as the service in replacing a faulty cooker has been handled efficiently with no quibbles. The cooker was faulty however...
The Falcon cooker we have just taken delivery of is very good but initially the controls take some getting used to. The design of it is great and I love the tall slim oven.

Helpful support assistant. Answered nearly all my questions. He didn't answer all - meaning I wanted a close up picture of dials and the website link he sent me did not show me this. But Matt Boyle answered all my other questions.

Review.Titre: Charley was quick to respond and try to…
Review.Contenu: Charley was quick to respond and try to help with the problem and gave me a telephone number of the correct people to contact.

Review.Titre: Our new oven was delivered quickly by…
Review.Contenu: Our new oven was delivered quickly by the Appliance People and they have been fantastic. Rangemaster needs to check when packing that they include all items. We received 2 sets of door handles but were missing the gridle. Rangemaster were quick to supply missing part, so my experience overall has been very good
I contacted Rangemaster about servicing my cooker. After a short wait on the “chat” I was directed to the repair partner by Matt Boyle.

Very good range cooker bought to replace my 25 year old model. I love having 2 ovens and hobs are great - a size for everything. Baseboard reaches floor on this one so stuff doesn't disappear underneath.Niggles - I miss the warmer I had on my previous model, I would have been prepared to sacrifice one of the hobs for a warmer.Grill is fixed in position on pull out  frame so not as adjustable as my old one.
The engineer was excellent. The original appointment was cancelled by Rangemaster without notification

Review.Titre: Pretty good overall but a few design improvements would get it ot 5 stars
Review.Contenu: 4.5 stars really. After a lot of research we purchased a Professional + FX 100 back in March 2022 as a replacement for our 9 year old John Lewis (Smeg) which was taking 45 mins to reach 220 deg. and then had the fan running for another 40 minutes after being switched off. We chose the FX for the well sized smaller oven which we use most of the time, and in preference to the 4 door arrangements which would require too much bending down. Overall, it is a vast improvement with better, more accurate temperature control, quicker oven heat-up and cools down without running the fan.  The pan supports are very solid and heavy (2kg - 4+kg).  There are a few niggles, though.  The oven control knobs are hard to read, with very light symbols and an angled face which picks up reflections. The large and useful drawer has no handle so one has to reach  below to open it.  The wok burner is over the smaller oven and would be better in the middle, with two conventional burners either side.  This would allow more room for everyday use (unless one uses the wok every day).

Review.Titre: Everything pretty good as expected but...
Review.Contenu: Everything pretty good as expected, but a couple of slight disappointments: gas ignition slightly temperamental as is smaller over door catch
Cannot fault the installation guys. Very polite and explained what they were doing and why

Review.Titre: I took 4 engineer visits to repair the…
Review.Contenu: I took 4 engineer visits to repair the fault but it kept reoccurring so Rangemaster replaced the device with know quibble
Cooker is as expected, delighted with it! Delivery was only marred by the lack of a phone call prior to arriving. Old cooker removed and new one delivered effectively (packaging also removed).
Great quality cooker, 1 star dropped for poor instructions and website, and illegible symbols on control knobs.

Review.Titre: Fabulous induction cooker but not sure about the warranty?
Review.Contenu: I bought an induction cooker which is absolutely fantastic! I would not have naturally bought such a cooker but having recently bought a house with a hole in the kitchen for a 90 cm Ringmaster cooker, I went for it and I am loving it. My only concern is the registration of warranty process: after entering all details on the RangeMaster website, you get a standard email with no mention of personal details or the device. In fact I got the exact same email for both the cooker and the hood.

Review.Titre: Issues with my Rangemaster cooker again
Review.Contenu: Charley dealt with all my questions and has arranged an engineer to visit .I am satisfied with my interaction.
Great new cooker, finally working after being replaced because of damage and repair of the replacement..... Could do better, especially at these prices.

Review.Titre: We had a few challenges with new fitted…
Review.Contenu: We had a few challenges with new fitted kitchen that need to be fitted so had to change delivery a few times with Rangemaster, thankfully Sophie was very understanding and helpful, finally getting my new Rangemaster fitted on the 4th, thank you Sophie

I liaised with Eugiene who was very helpful in ensuring that our Rangemaster was delivered by 7th November.  She arranged this via the Rangemaster Crew rather than using Caboodle and the cooker was actually delivered on 2nd November.   I found Eugiene to be very polite and helpful.

Review.Titre: Rangemaster did their best to put right…
Review.Contenu: Rangemaster did their best to put right the appalling service from AO the original suppliers of the cooker.

Review.Titre: Delivery and fitting went very smoothly…
Review.Contenu: Delivery and fitting went very smoothly . Cooker is working well
Charley was helpful in pointing me to the products I was interested in.

Review.Titre: I had a lot of trouble with my…
Review.Contenu: I had a lot of trouble with my Rangemaster cooker but Marie has given me excellent customer service and now rectified the problem.
Brogan didn't manage it on Monday but Matt Doyle did it all for me today.

A beautiful cooker that has many great features. I bought it about four months ago and use it every day. I just wanted experience as many of its features as possible before writing a review.ProsExcellent main fan oven.Baking tray attached to the main oven door is convenient to use.All five burners with different power outputs. Burners are well spaced and have solid pan supports. The wok burners is great for stir fry and cooking in large pots.Knobs are well marked, particularly the oven knobs have temperatures written on the knob and the fascia panel.Good grill but need to keep an eye on it while it is being used as it could overcook quickly.ConsNo quick start guide provided.The instruction manual is written for three different models in one manual. Did not mentioned anywhere that the cooker needs be connected to 32A electrical supply.No light in the tall oven or in the grill.Minute minder beeper sound is disappointingly too low even when set to its maximum. It is difficult to hear when it beeps from a few metres away from the cooker.  My old 1990's Leisure gas cooker beeper was audible from several metres away. No griddle supplied for Kitchener.Dust and small pieces of plastic/metal were inside the oven when bought it as new.

Review.Titre: Good product a bit flimsy compared to…
Review.Contenu: Good product a bit flimsy compared to my old rangemaster

Review.Titre: My new range master cooker was…
Review.Contenu: My new range master cooker was delivered the delivery guys were really friendly and knowledgeable about the cooker.I have used the cooker and found it excellent, I did have a little trouble at the beginning in working out the symbols on the dials as the book that came with the cooker was a generic one and some of the symbols on the cooker I have were not listed so a bit of trial and error,.But now very happy and enjoying using the cooker.

Review.Titre: Rangemaster responded very quickly, but the message content could be improved…
Review.Contenu: Rangemaster responded very quickly to my request (resolution of rust on oven door of a high end  RangeMaster Range cooker just over two years old. Receiving agent sent message to Repair department which sent out by SMS a date for appointment (no time included - not even am/pm) the SMS message had no information to allow identification of the source - could easily be regarded as a scam but it was possible to track the job using a web-based app and provided information to understand the source and the nature of the work to be completed.Excellent response time however message content from Reoair team needs expansion in order to allow the customer to understand where it is coming from.
Initial contact poor. Visit by engineer very good.

After about 25 years service our Rangemaster expired and so because of so many years of excellent service we purchased a rangemaster Elise 110 in china blue which looks fantastic. Sadly there were a couple of faults to the new cooker. Neither of the oven doors fitted properly and the light in one of the ovens didn’t work as the wiring had not been installed for the light. After some irritating issues in contacting rangemaster these faults have now been rectified and the ovens and induction rings work superbly. Very pleased with the cooker.

Review.Titre: I have no issue with the ability of the…
Review.Contenu: I have no issue with the ability of the cooker to do what it’s supposed to do and do it well. I have an issue with the design of the adjustment to the front levelling legs. It should be adjustable, like the rear ones, from inside the front bottom plate, but there is nothing there to raise or lower the legs other than tilting the cooker back, taking the weight from the legs to enable adjustment. A wing nut or something similar would make it easier.

Review.Titre: Ordered a new Rangemaster 110 dual fuel…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a new Rangemaster 110 dual fuel cooker because the old Rangemaster dual fuel was over 30 years old. We found out that the old one was 110 cm wide and the new one 109,5 cm wide. Now there is a 5 mm gap between the counter and the cooker. Why on earth would you make it 5mm shorter whilst the model is still 110. Also the fan was loose and needs to be replaced. Not a very good start Rangemaster.

We had a Rangemaster Nexus 110 delivered in November 2021.  The shelf runner on the right hand side of fan has always been very loose and both shelves have to be fitted to keep it in place.  There are unsightly streaks appearing between the glass sections in the door caused by moisture.  Where there are weep holes inside the door at the bottom the white paint is flaking and rust is appearing.  None of these things are acceptable in a cooker this expensive.

Review.Titre: Helped me identify oven with no ID…
Review.Contenu: Helped me identify oven with no ID plate.  Matt Boyle very helpfull
A couple of minor issues; the position of the plinth connector was wrong for the plinth and one bolt at the rear was loose - both fixed promptly by a very pleasant service guy

The Rangemaster was already installed in our new build house when we moved in. Wasn’t sure if I would like it, as I’m used to a combination of gas and electric, not all electric. I would have given five stars, but the small fan oven doesn’t work. Hopefully someone will come and repair it soon.

Review.Titre: Great cooker - shame about the manual
Review.Contenu: Great cooker - hobs quickly respond up/down, BUT manual woefully inadequate. Had gas cooker all my long life so far and need to know basic info which is missing - what is maximum temperature of top oven? Can you take a hot tin out of oven and put on ceramic hob which is cold? Can I use ceramic hob to store pots etc on eg soup when cold? How much weight will it take - I use Le Creuset pans so a large pot of cold soup weighs quite a bit! I’m sure there will be more questions as I use my lovely new cooker!

Review.Titre: Rangemaster Professional Plus Side Panel Issue
Review.Contenu: My Rangemaster Professional Plus was installed on Oct 14th and within 30minutes of the installers leaving I had to call my retailer to schedule a maintenance appointment. The door on the main oven was catching on the side panel making it difficult to open and close the door and making the most awful noise, and I also didn't know what additional damage I might be doing if I continued to open and close the door, so I did not use the main oven.  Rangemaster were prompt, I had the requested call within a week and the diagnosis was a new side panel had to be fitted.  This apparently is not an uncommon occurrence.  Within two weeks from installation I had a new panel fitted and the oven is now great.  I very much like the range over my old Smeg, and have swapped from gas to induction which is a bit of a learning curve but no regrets.  I feel that Rangemaster QC processes at the manufacturing facility should have caught the issue before the range left the factory.

Review.Titre: Love it We have a problem with the big ring…
Review.Contenu: We have a problem with the big ring it’s giving a loud noise

Review.Titre: this is fourth call out for problems…
Review.Contenu: this is fourth call out for problems with ignition and temp. not amazed by this cooker. I was waiting for an appointment for engineer as per email but he turned up and had no idea he was coming that day as not informed.  however, he was helpful and friendly.

Overall , pleased with new cooker. Find it difficult to see different oven functions on knob I chose this model because of the multi function oven which seem good I think the tall oven will be useful for batch cooking, and cooking small quantities.

The oven in our new Rangemaster has stopped working. We experienced delays in getting it repaired under warranty as it is an LPG oven and LPG gas fitters are not abundant in our area. Rangemaster kept chasing to get an LPG trained fitter and to their credit they were successful. The oven was repaired. 4 Stars.

Looks great, love the induction hob; easy to use and to keep clean.  Still new so getting used to the multi function oven.  Cooked scones using the fan setting: the top shelf (on the 2nd runner down) were a little over done whereas the bottom shelf were perfect.  I thought the fan distributed the heat evenly.  Might be because it's new?

Review.Titre: Super service from Charly just before…
Review.Contenu: Super service from Charly just before Xmas..no serial number for 2015 cooker but with a little perseverance part sorted and purchased from supplied link in less than an hour!!

I had a 7 years old Aga Little Wenlock Classic Multi fuel stove that had been regularly serviced and maintained but at the last sweep in September 2023 I notice the internal casting had cracked around the top left tie bolt. Aga offer a 5 year body guarantee but even though mine was 7 years old I thought I'd contact them via their Customer Service. After a lot of emails with photos and documents going back and forth Aga agreed to replace my stove with a brand new Little Wenlock EC4 stove free of charge that I could pay a local installer to fit. Just in time for Christmas my new stove is now fitted and working great so many thanks to Helen in Customer Services and Sophie in Home Deliveries for their exceptional service and a Merry Christmas to all the staff at Aga.
Rangemaster induction cooker installed by two very friendly and efficient guys, Simon and Phil. We were given a guided tour of the controls and how to use the induction hob. Thank you Simon and Phil.

I cannot praise Rangemaster highly enough. I telephoned because my cooker had broken down just before Christmas too. Sharon in home delivery deserves a special mention. She worked for ages to identify the problem (successfully) and then to find a way of rectifying it. When it became clear that the appliance couldn’t be repaired, she tried really hard to find a replacement that could be delivered prior to Christmas. Sharon then put me through to Sam in sales who was equally helpful in helping me to find a new cooker. She clearly spent a great deal of time analysing the range of appliances then sent a personal email with a selection appropriate to my requirements. Both Sharon and Sam were so professional, understanding and friendly. Rangemaster should be proud of their excellent customer service. I only wish I could say the same about other companies. it is also worth mentioning that my cooker turned out to be 22 years old so has given me a very good service indeed. I have no hesitation whatsoever in buying another Rangemaster and recommend the brand and service at the highest level.

Our new cooker arrived on the dot of the beginning of the delivery slot. Simon and Phil, who delivered and installed the cooker, were courteous, polite, good-humoured, genuinely funny, and were exemplary in their professionalism. The cooker was swiftly installed despite a minor problem with the gas pipe (sorted by the chaps!). They cleared up after the installation, including taking the packaging away along with the old cooker, and never failed to make sure our cat wasn’t getting up to mischief! Very satisfied with the cooker itself, the help we received from the company when it was needed (a late change to the delivery arrangements), and (of course) with Phil and Simon.

Review.Titre: Spoke to Matt who was very helpful and…
Review.Contenu: Spoke to Matt who was very helpful and reordered a part which had been sent but never arrived.

Review.Titre: Christmas dinner saved thanks to SOPHIE.
Review.Contenu: My new Rangemaster arrived from the Supplier in Ireland without the promised LPG jets, which left us unable to have the cooker installed and also no cooking facilities.  I contacted Rangemaster and spoke to SOPHIE who kindly had the jets delivered the very next day.  Many thanks Sophie you have saved our Christmas dinner!!!    Very very good fast service and much appreciated!
I rang rangemaster this morning re my annoying dripping tap. I spoke to a lovely guy named Matthew Boyle who went above and beyond to help re ordering new valves.  Many thanks Mathew 😊

Excellent service from Dwayne who had to sort out some unexpected electric issues in order to fit the new Falcon range cooker. The whole service was above and beyond and I would highly recommend. Thank you!

Review.Titre: On line chat with Rangmaster help line…
Review.Contenu: On line chat with Rangmaster help line Matt Boyle was very efficient.
I have contacted due to missing items. It is resolved and arranged delivery

Review.Titre: Excellent after care and product support
Review.Contenu: Sophie at Rangemaster was extremely helpful arranging delivery of an LPG converter kit to be sent out overnight for our new Classic 110 Dual Fuel Cooker.Also registering our appliance for the two year warranty at the same time.

Great service from RangeMaster. My new cooker had a minor fault requiring a new part, and Rangemaster could not have been more helpful: an engineer was booked. A very professional chap came quickly, identified the fault and ordered the spare part. I then called up on the 5th of December to chase what was going on. I used the online chat service and Matt Boyle will be chasing this up and getting back to me by phone to let me know repair updates and dates for the technician to return. I am delighted. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Review.Titre: We had an issue with a damaged item…
Review.Contenu: We had an issue with a damaged item which Sophie went out of her way to resolve. Immediately ordering a replacement and arranging speedy delivery. We appreciate her communication and rapid problem solving which meant that we were able to complete our kitchen installation on time. Thank you Sophie!!!

Review.Titre: Very speedy and helpful response from Dominik
Review.Contenu: Wanted to know min and max height to position a hood above a rangemaster range. Dominik responded very quickly and very efficiently with the answer. Far better than sitting on the phone waiting to speak to someone!

Review.Titre: remove old and install new Range
Review.Contenu: Skip and Zen removed my old rangemaster and installed a new one today. Really lovely guys who made the whole process so easy with minimal mess. Thanks so much
Rangemaster responded quickly and generously to our need for an urgent repair for an out of warranty cooker so that our homeless clients could be sure of their Christmas lunch.
Skip and Zen arrived promptly, were friendly and professional, and did a fantastic job. Brilliant service, thank you

Great service from Sophie, even though she clearly sounded under the weather. I couldn't fault her - Super friendly, professional and she got the query sorted with efficiency. She provided the good old fashioned customer service that is sadly now a thing of the past. She is a credit to the company...Thank you Sophie!
The customer service assistant (Dominik) was great and solved the problem for us free of charge!

Review.Titre: Matt was able to help me with my issue
Review.Contenu: Matt was able to help me with my issue, on cleaning the base of my Rangemaster cooker.

Had several chats with Matt Boyle at Rangemaster re our cooker hood. All lights stopped working and Matt arranged an engineers visit. Engineer reported that parts were unavailable but Matt subsequently confirmed they were still available and said he would arrange a further engineers visit to resolve and fit new parts.

Review.Titre: I bought a Rangemaster cooker and the customer service was great
Review.Contenu: I bought a Rangemaster cooker and found the plinth on the bottom had a couple of small marks and part of the paint had wrinkled.I phoned Rangemaster was asked a questions and sent them 3 photos of the marks . A big thank you to Sophie Home Delivery Co-Ordinator who I spoke to and arranged for a new plinth to be sent out which I received really quickly , Sophie also asked if I needed an engineer to fit it which l didn't. 4 days from start to finish. AGA Rangemaster
Skip and Zen were lovely, helpful and nothing was too much trouble in our Aga delivery and set up. I hope they had a good trip back and both 😉enjoyed the Christmas songs! Zoe
Fast, polite and efficient.  I was very grateful to Matt Boyle who like his colleague Dominik dealt with the issue incredibly quickly.
Sophie's interaction and attention to detail has been very good. Thank you for your help.
Delivery arrived on time and was really well packaged. Keith and Clifton were polite, careful and had no problems with me inspecting the contents prior to leaving. Would definitely use again.

Sophie was very polite, professional and helpful. She has the ability to identify and address the customer's issues efficiently. She is very calm and has the ability to navigate tough conversations with customers. She has a strong grip over the day-to-day happenings of the company. She kindly helped me rearrange my fridge delivery multiple times, always calling back when she needed to, hence I was always satisfied with the service. My issue has been recurrent since March, and Sophie always stayed calm and was willing to sort out the matter. Sophie is the face of the company and the company is very lucky to have her. I wish her success in life.

Yesterday I rang rangemaster because although I’ve had the cooker for nearly a year it has been sitting in my kitchen boxed up while renovation work was being completed. Finally had my kitchen installed a few weeks ago and the grand opening of my rangemaster took place. The electrician set it all up and I was ready to put it to task when suddenly the lights in my house tripped. I’d put the grill on. Panic set in and immediately rang rangemaster. The man I spoke to couldn’t have been more helpful if he’d tried!! I’m so sorry I didn’t take down his name but he organised for an engineer to come out today. In no time at all my rangemaster is fully functioning. Thank you to the guy who answered my call in the activate your warrantee section excellent customer service.

Review.Titre: I have had excellent customer service…
Review.Contenu: I have had excellent customer service from the delivery men Mark and Keith, who delivered and installed my new cooker.  They explained everything in detail about the functions of the oven and carried out the work efficiently.  I then had to speak to Emma in customer services, and once again she was extremely helpful and professional.  All 3 staff that I have dealt with have been an asset to Aga.

Excellent service delivered as stated on purchase date and the installation went through without hitch.The engineers were really helpful and gave good advice.The Rangemaster appliance is known to me and from experience I know that it is an excellent one.

My kitchen fitting company had made errors with my order. I contacted Rangemaster direct and was delighted with how professional they were with dealing with my problem. I spoke to Sharon who explained the ordering process to me and told me where the problem was. I could then liaise with the kitchen fitters and get the item reordered. Sharon then followed up with a courtesy call to advise the order was on its way! Superb customer service. Thank you Sharon :-)

I recently wrote to Rangemaster after I had purchased timer knobs and been sent the wrong ones.  I was told the ones I required were not available.  I wrote to Rangemaster explaining my problem and received an immediate reply from them and the offer of the correct ones complimentary.  You could not expect better service than this.

Review.Titre: Great service by Andy and Paul
Review.Contenu: Andy and Paul delivered our new cocker today. They were fantastic. They communicated well about their ETA and despite not being informed ahead of time that we needed them to remove the old cooker, they accommodated that with no trouble. They were coutures and took great care at installing our new cooker. They were informative and made sure we understood how to operate our new appliance. They are a true asset to their company.
Fantastic customer service regarding our home delivery. Sophie was super helpful and went over and above to keep us updated about delivery date and time.

I reported a fault with my Rangemaster hob control knobs as two of them had broken. The appliance is 20 months old, so still under guarantee. I received an acknowledgement almost immediately and then later the same day I received an email from Charley confirming that replacement control knobs had been ordered. Excellent service. Thank you Charley.

Whilst simply ringing to register my new Rangemaster cooker for the 2 yr warranty on offer I was a little frustated because the phone no. detailed on the leaflet which came with the cooker wasn't operational.  instead a recorded message directed me to another telephone numner, which it turned out wouldn't allow you to register your product, but instead directed me to a website, which when i tried to log onto it, also wasn't working. Undeterred I rang through to the Rangemaster call centre where T got through to Sharon, who was extraordinarily polite, and immediately apologised for the problems I'd experienced, and sounded as is she genuinely meant it.  That alone awards them (and in particular her) 5 stars.It's a simple thing to say, but it put me at ease, and negated any of the frustrations I'd experienced before hand.Thank you Sharon.  Job well done!

Our delivery was prompt throughout. We were Kept up to date with dates and times. There were some issues with arrangements, due to John Lewis not completing paperwork and planning, and their call centre was useless. Fortunately the two delivery persons, Skip and Zen,  were so helpful. They went above and beyond. Put our minds at rest and the Cooker was installed perfectly, old cooker removed, helpful  instructions given and kitchen left clean and tidy.

I was expecting a customer service situation that was not positive.  I cannot fault the person I spoke to called Dean.  Rangemaster had not received our warranty because of the postal system.  Dean discussed it with us and arranged for an engineer to attend.  He didn't even disbelieve me, such a right way to deal with people who have spent £3.5K on a oven.  There is a problem with my cooker, BUT BUT Dean needs a pay rise for his consideration and politeness.  Well done you, working in a particularly difficult environment, call centres are not good.  With kindest regards Elaine Miller.  P.S.  I really hope your engineer is the same

Andy and Paul came to install our new  Rangemaster in Wetherby yesterday, and take away the old one. We were pleased and very impressed with their service which was first class. They called to say they were on their way, and did everything efficiently and professionally leaving everything undamaged,clean and tidy. They took care to carry out a number of safety checks before starting and again after installation. They explained everything in a pleasant and professional manner.Thank you.

absolutely fantastic customer service from Sophie! What a pleasure it is to speak to such a professional and knowledgeable call handler. I had quite a tricky problem that needed solving, however, Sophie solved it in no time at all. Well done rangemaster much appreciated.

Review.Titre: Dominik was very helpful in live chat…
Review.Contenu: Dominik was very helpful in live chat with his advice regarding my fault

Review.Titre: Was looking for measurements of ovens…
Review.Contenu: Was looking for measurements of ovens on a 100cm range cooker rather than maximum tray size or size in litres.  Contacted Matt Boyle on the live chat.  Whilst these were not a standard request, he sourced the information with a phone call to his technical department.
Rangemaster oven exchange - dealt with promptly and efficiently. Great delivery team of Skip and Zen who couldn’t have been nicer

Initially I wrote a very critical review of Aga regarding my rangemaster 'rusting' within 4 years!But! Aga have now resolved the issue .They replaced the rusty panels and two others do all panels matched.Which is the service one would expect I am now a very happy customer.Well done Aga
Fantastic after sales service. Even though I received a defective cooker it was replaced with another one when I contacted them

Review.Titre: Brigi has been an absolutely fantastic…
Review.Contenu: Brigi has been an absolutely fantastic customer services assistant. She has been polite, considerate, professional, helpful and efficient every step of the way with regard to my situation. I am very grateful and pleased with the service she has provided. Thank you so very much.

The two men, Skip and zen could not have been better. The range was installed quickly and efficiently and the old range taken away. They explained how to use the new ovens etc and made sure i was completely happy before they left.

I just had my cooker delivered by Keith & Clifton & they were amazing, so polite, so clean & so thorough with testing & explaining to me how to use the Rangemaster could not be happier & recommend the product & the company to anyone.

Review.Titre: Quick reply to find a spare part for a…
Review.Contenu: Quick reply to find a spare part for a product purchased 10 years ago. I am glad the product support helps me be sustainable

The timer on our new NEXUS arrange cooker failed after a power cut.  Charley at Rangemaster was quick to respond  when I contacted Customer Serviced and the repair was arranged quickly. Big thanks to Charley for progressing this so promptly

I spoke with Dean this morning about Falcon ranges.  My elderly parents are interested in buying one, having seen mine in action.  Dean was really helpful, talking me through the different options and advising on the electrical work that needed to be done.  He also found the nearest showroom to my parents and gave me the phone number.  A great service!  Many thanks, Jacky Baxter

Ordered a range cooker via John Lewis who advertised the lead time as shorter than it should have been. After waiting and wondering what the delay was I followed up with Rangemaster directly. They updated me on the situation and Sophie provided me with a small complimentary item as a gesture of good will even though it was John Lewis’ fault. The oven itself has been great and been impressed by the customer service.

Our Rangemaster Professional Plus 110 looks absolutely fabulous. Initially we had problems with the induction hobs - the steam from the oven seemed to get in and slowly deteriorate them. Rangemaster support were very good sending around engineers to replace parts. Ultimately being unable to fully solve the problem they replaced the whole oven even though it was technically out of warranty. I can't thank the Rangemaster Support team enough for their helpfulness.

Review.Titre: Delighted with the style and substance…
Review.Contenu: Delighted with the style and substance of my new Rangemaster longstock 90. The chaps fitting the appliance were very helpful and cheerful too

Review.Titre: Dominik on the live chat function was…
Review.Contenu: Dominik on the live chat function was fantastic help. Needed an LPG convertor kit for a customer. Arranged instantly for this to be sent directly to the customer. brilliant service!! thank you ;o)

Our 2.5 year old tape has developed a drip and the plumber says it requires a new cartridge. Neither myself nor the plumber could find any useful information so I thought I'd give Rangemaster's Live Chat a try.I still wasn't expecting much, as I didn't have a receipt, or details of the supplier, and I was told Rangemaster don't have part numbers for tap parts.Next thing I knew, Matt Boyle told me some spare parts would be in the post in a couple of days.Thanks again, Matt.

Review.Titre: Worth contacting with a problem, very helpfull
Review.Contenu: Only had to wait a minute to be connected.wrote down my problem and received an answer that solved the problem of fitting new catch on very very old Rangemaster cooker door, saved me over two hundred pound for repair man. Thankyou Dominik :)

I contacted Rangemaster as our Belfast kitchen tap spout had tarnishing.  I recieved a prompt reply and was asked to submit pictures.  I received a reply the following day to provide some additonal details (when kitchen changed and supplier) and received a reply informing me a new spout would be sent under the 5 year warranty.  Item arrived in 2 working days.  Thank you Matt, great service.

Credit where it's due. Needed to replace the strainer basket washer on our 1.5 bowl Rangemaster sink but couldn't find anywhere online to order one.An exchange of emails with Joe in Customer Care resulted in a quick and agreeable solution. Joe really excelled and provided great service and a positive outcome.Joe is a credit to his employer and we'll worthy of praise.Best regards,John
Although a problem with the initial delivery of our oven, sophie at customer service was brilliant and so helpful.
Brilliant service, quick connection, fast response and knowledgeable about the product. Great customer service. I was dealing with Dominik today

Our delivery team were really helpful and, while they were there, assisted checking our Rangemaster oven had no defects. We did notice some small scratches on the plinth and the team took photos and reported the damage. Within a short space of time a member of Delivery co-ordinater team, Sophie, contacted us and offered to arrange delivery of the replacement part. After a short conversation, as we’d said, the marks were not obvious, or affecting the oven, we were offered a financial refund. We used that to buy some cookware. Sophie was extremely helpful throughout and we have had the item delivered. A really good experience with Rangemaster and I’d recommend them to anyone.

I contacted customer service about a problem with a tap. Brigi was very helpful and arranged the replace ment parts to be sent out even informing me that, as my request was within the original 5 year warranty period, they were FOC. Parts arrived within 3 working days

I inherited a beautiful Rangemaster Electric Cooker when I moved in.  Turns out the User Guide, that I also inherited, was for an earlier model.  The live chat customer support very quickly sorted the matter out, sent the right Users Guide and gave me some tips on cleaning as well.

I've just had excellent customer service from Dean at Rangemaster. He was very helpful in sending out an item we needed for our new 90cm Dual Fuel Rangemaster. He also gave me useful information about Homeserve and quickly registered our range. I couldn't have been more pleased with his help.
Unbelievably good service. Tap started dripping. Used the chat service today. Interacted with Matt -  parts already in the post. Doesn't get better than that!!

Review.Titre: Help with location of spare Ice box
Review.Contenu: Really easy to find the link to live chat, we kept getting cut off but I kept getting reconnected back to the same guy Matt Boyle. He was so so helpful, and eventually after getting cut off 3’times he managed to find me a link to the part I was looking for that I’d scoured the internet for and couldn’t find myself. He was very polite and efficient, really really impressed,What great customer service from this gentleman.

Review.Titre: Range master offer a new door handle for our Elise oven
Review.Contenu: Our Rangemaster Elise is 2 years old and just out of warranty. We  have had a problem with a faulty oven door handle which meant we couldn't use the oven. I spoke to Brigi at customer service who was very helpful. She agreed to send us a new handle and instructions showing how to fit it. We were extremely grateful as this was an expensive oven and we weren't expecting a problem

Sophie was great. I’d missed several of her calls about delivery yet she still persevered! And when we spoke she was really nice and managed to organise a delivery date which was much sooner than I expected which was great with the colder weather about to come. Have been recommending the company ever since.

Review.Titre: Rangemaster: excellent customer service for an excellent product
Review.Contenu: I needed a small trim piece for a Rangemaster granite sink which I had recently installed. I couldn't find it on any spares website and so contacted Rangemaster direct. Matt, one of their Consumer Care Advisors, replied immediately and sent me the item free-of-charge as a gesture of goodwill.

Sophie was very good. Our connection got cut off at one point and she called back, which not everyone would. I had also got through to the wrong department for what I needed, but she still took on everything and cheerfully fulfilled the two issues I had.

Review.Titre: I have a ongoing issue with my kitchen…
Review.Contenu: I have a ongoing issue with my kitchen tap, and range master could not do enough to help, support and resolve my situation. They have Tracey and Jo go on Above & Beyond, but I would describe as customer service! To say it has been a pleasure and exceptional. Would be an understatement. They continued to ask probing questions that would resolve my problem. Nothing was beyond their assistance. I cannot praise Joe and Tracey highly enough.
Dominik was great. Sorted out missing part on new range cooker immediately, and ordered for couple of days time. Wife not impressed with missing bit but hopefully al sorted straight away!

We inherited an older Rangemaster with our latest house.  It was proving difficult to find the correct user guide online but after exchanging a view messages with Gemma, the correct version was on its way to me and is printing now.  Excellent customer service even probably 10 years after the sale!

Review.Titre: Thank you Brigi at Rangemaster Customer services
Review.Contenu: Brigi from customer services dealt with my complaint about a fault on our new range politely and quickly, advising us to send the photos of the fault direct to her. I  did this and the following morning  received details of how an exchange of the faulty door will be dealt with. Thank you Bridgi

Review.Titre: The delivery and installation by Rangemaster
Review.Contenu: The delivery and installation by Richard and Neil went like a dream. Old one out, updated gas fixings and put the new one in. They were very efficient and told us all we needed to know about the new cooker. Sophie from deliveries followed up with a phone call. It couldn’t have been easier or any less stressful.

Extended Warranty Issue.  I have dealt with Dominik Nosal today - a Consumer Services Co-Ordinator with Rangemaster.  I had a web chat with him for about 45 minutes and he was extremely helpful.  Thanks to him, the relevant parties have been contacted and I hope my issue is resolved soon.  Thank you to Dominik.

The enamel on the main oven door of my rangemaster began to bubble and peel revealing rust so I went on the Rangemaster website with a view to sending an email.  As I couldn't find an appropriate address I ended up with a "Live Chat". I was very sceptical but Dominik who assisted me was very helpful and after much discussion a successful outcome was made.  My only negative was the time it took from start to finish was just over an hour. That said I was very happy with the outcome and thanks to Dominik who made this possible.

I just want to shout out to Sharon in home delivery - she is an absolute superstar!! Within 20 mins of me phoning today (05-09-23) the problem had been rectified and she made me the happiest person alive.  I wish that when the universe repays her for her very kind act, that this is paid in abundance!! Sharon you have made me so so happy and I can’t thank you enough - Range master - you have a star customer service representative and she has done you proud!! Thank you Sharon - you were an absolute delight and a credit to Rangemaster
Matt was quick, polite and helpful and went out of his way to help me avoid future problems.

Contacted Rangemaster due to a fault with a kitchen tap that had become apparent after some use. The top part of our Pro Pray had become loose with the main lower body. After a quick chat and exchange of pictures showing the fault to Matt one of their online chat advisors a new part is winging its way to us as I write this. Customer service is excellent. And stress free. When a company acts quickly for their customers that’s when it counts.
Keith and Clifton installed our new rangemaster cooker for us. Both were really helpful and a pleasure to deal with.

Review.Titre: Dominik was outstanding and helped me…
Review.Contenu: Dominik was outstanding and helped me through a problem with my tap. So helpful, thank you

Review.Titre: Was having registration issues for a warranty
Review.Contenu: Had some trouble with registering a product with its serial number not being recognised. Matt was a great help on the three times I got through to him and he managed to solve my issue.

Review.Titre: Sharon in customer service was amazing
Review.Contenu: Sharon in customer service was amazing! My falcon induction range cooker stopped working, displaying an unusual fault code. Then the glass cracked. Sharon helped and supported through the whole process leading up to the final visit of the engineers today. Wonderful service!

Excellent customer service. From my initial call with Tracey, to the engineer who came to fix the clock on my 6 month old rangemaster pro, people could not have been more helpful, professional and efficient. Such a joy in this current climate of poor customer service. Thank you.

Charley was a great help to me over some photos I couldn't send to her. She was really helpful and so patient with me and tried different ways for me to try and get the photos to go but I still couldn't do it. I think the technology has passed me by now I'm in my 80s.

Review.Titre: Late but honest thank you to Sophie…
Review.Contenu: Late but honest thank you to Sophie from AGA RangeMaster for deescalating the situation and producing a solution. 0800Repair damaged my parents fridge freezer and avoided any contact for months. After I escalated the case directly to RangeMaster I was contacted by Sophie from AGA RangeMaster who quickly and smoothly handled the situation and solved the problems. Thank You Sophie

I had an AGA pan that after many years of use became defective. I contacted AGA and through Eugenie Hill I was sent a brand new pan.  I found the service efficient, polite and above what I expected as an outcome.

Review.Titre: Meeting a helpful and kind Consumer Care advisor is a great bonus when purchasing an expensive product
Review.Contenu: The Consumer Care Advisor Brigi was very helpful taking her time to listen and answer my queries advising how best to simplify using the Rangemaster search to make my search easier as I was finding it difficult to access the information that was important to me. Brigi kindly waited until I had received her email with important hob and cookware. Brigi made my phone call and experience worthwhile.

Review.Titre: Engineers Bruce and Richard rang to…
Review.Contenu: Engineers Bruce and Richard rang to give us their eta which was helpful. They worked quickly and efficiently to remove our old cooker and install our new one.

Review.Titre: I would like to extend my thanks to…
Review.Contenu: I would like to extend my thanks to Eugenie who dealt with our issue quickly and efficiently and, ensured that we were able to find the right solution.Sometimes, it’s about getting the right person with the wherewithal to be able to solve an issue and Eugenie has that.Thank you.

Review.Titre: I spoke to Brigi from the customer care…
Review.Contenu: I spoke to Brigi from the customer care team who was very helpful and efficient from start to finish. She sorted a replacement dishwasher almost immediately rang me back when she said she would and kept me updated on progress. Thank you!

DEAN, the man I spoke to, was so helpfull, nothing was too much trouble, he went the extra mile to find any answer for my questions from all over the net.He had an in depth conversation with me, and his help was invauable.This is service you should get everywhere.

Review.Titre: I thought I had a problem with my…
Review.Contenu: I thought I had a problem with my professional plus 110 ceramic cooker but after talking to Dean a very helpful engineer at Rangemaster it seems that a fan that has suddenly decided to work is how it should be. So pleased with the information, what a relief.😅A very happy customer
Matt was helpful and answered several questions I had about the products.

Dominic was extremely helpful. I had a problem with my sink overflow. He identified the part from pictures I sent and then sent me an exploded view of the parts I needed. I could not find the part on the website so he very kindly agreed to send it to me. Would certainly choose Rangemaster again.

This is the second time I have contacted Rangemaster customer service this week. This time I was helped by Matt. He was extremely helpful and he was able to answer all my queries immediately. Excellent customer service

I spoke to Brigi for some assistance on behalf of my Daughter after an online retailer advised her that they had no record of her order for a Rangemaster Hartland sink which had arrived damaged. Brigi was very helpful and advised that she could assist with a replacement once she had received photos of the damage and all other relevant details such as the retailer / order date / delivery address etc. Thank you so much.
